name: 长征1934-1936
description:
In the eyes of many people, when it comes to the Long March, it is easy to think of such great deeds as the "Zunyi Meeting" and "Flying to Capture the Luding Bridge". However, when you, as a character following the Red Army on the Long March, simulate the route of the Red Army's Long March and conduct another "Long March", it will not only allow you to quickly understand the general course of the Long March, but also the inevitable events and trigger events in the game. Your character deeply experienced the hardships of the Red Army on the Long March.

How to play

1. The Long March course is automatically played, and you only need to make simple decisions and operations on inevitable events and trigger events to continue advancing the game.
2. The game is divided into two stages: before the round and during the round. The former will statically display the current Long March route and related content of the selected Red Army unit, while the latter will display these content dynamically.

Script:

The Long March scripts of 8 different Red Army units including the Central Red Army

Roles:

There are hidden bonuses for different genders and occupations
